TopicTitle: Movie Recreations using the Mission Builder.

Articles.Content:
As most of us should be aware, the Official Squad Expansion, includes a tool called mission builder.
An ability to create detailed, more or less challenging stories/missions.

Something many probably though of as well,
Using the Mission Builder to create detailed movie recreations.

So, when the Expansion gets released to the public, how long should it be estimated to last,
till one creates an almost 1/1 copy/recreating of Interstellar/The Martian or other spacethemed Movies (With or without mods).
Movie-themed challenge missions. "Attach this drill/bomb unit to the asteroid hurtling at Kerbin".

32 minutes ago, Abpilot said:

Interstellar?

The movie.

I'd personally love to make or play a recreation of Project Elrond from The Martian. (:

There are so many movies that would be tough to reproduce because the movies were written with little or no regard to real-world physics. Recreating them would just make it glaringly obvious just how bad the science in the movie was 

It could be fun to create missions that challenge you to achieve the same results, but within the bounds of KSP physics.
